channel.title: Rundll.exe problem
channel.description:
hi everyone my family friends gave there computer to fix it. i have found that it had a rundll.exe problem. i tried searching but didn't go now where.
they have some important stuff in it and they said they don't want to copy it on an external hard drive so i can reformat it.
meanwhile i tried installing all the anti virus softwares and other program (took them off now) there ware no good. if u click the control panel and in the control panel click add or remove programs or any of the list and or if you click the clock an error massage will be displayed with the massage in the picture.
the computer is running windows xp home edition SP2.
if you click on the image you can see a print shot of the error massage
can anyone please help me or advise me what to do.

item.title: Rundll.exe problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

easiest way here : open start —> run —> msconfig —> startup —> and then make sure rundll.exe isnt ticked now that wont bother u

to make sure u chosen the right one…under command u will see its place…it its end was rundll.exe then u succesfuly prevented it from opening when u open ur computer…rep if helped

Read full topic

item.title: Rundll.exe problem
item.dc:creator: @person1936 person1936
item.description:
@person1936 wrote:

dllhost.exe
works the same

Read full topic

item.title: Rundll.exe problem
item.dc:creator: @happy_world happy_world
item.description:
@happy_world wrote:

On another topic

Put the disc in before XP loads as if you were reinstalling. Then it will look like it is going to reinstall XP, and will load everything up but then you press R for repair when it gives you the option.

oh thanks i will try it now

Read full topic

item.title: Rundll.exe problem
item.dc:creator: @happy_world happy_world
item.description:
@happy_world wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:213474”]Got an XP disc? If you have, use it to repair the OS. If not, download one

Oh and you could try getting SP3 from Microsoft Update. I think it was released a month ago…[/quote]

hey got the xp cd but there is no where does it say repair operating system
and went into every one. none said it

Read full topic

i am not a stupid spastic like you
